channel.title: [REL] Sword of the spirits [REL]
channel.description:
This is not my concept, it was created by someone else. I made the model and I am releasing it, you'll need to make your own ints for it.
[IMG]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x470/0acer0/SotSU.jpg[/img]
[url=http://up.ht/TyRzVL]Download[/url]

razami:

I Vain I all you do on moparscape is flame peoples work u think u know everything y dont u ever right a nice post ur always such a bully on these fourms and people like u make moparscape fourms horrible…

Btw, read the rules:

We use "you" not "u", "your" not "ur"

item.title: [REL] Sword of the spirits [REL]
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:35, topic:382809”][quote author=sjustin1996 link=topic=478597.msg3518863#msg3518863 date=1299242006]

I would pay you $4.50 to give me one that works in-game with ints if I could. And I can, just not here, apparently.

Honestly pretty damn awesome.

Take your 4.50 to turbosquid.com and get something worth 4.50 no offence to Amy.

I agree, this isn’t worth anything. Thats why i said it in a previous post…

I would be paying for the idea, the concept, and the nice way you followed through with it by creating it. Bit of godsword + new name + good coloring + strange lightning kind of shit on the side = $4.50

Just in case you guys know how little $4.50 is, I spend $20 on a single piece of software that took half as much work as this. $4.50 is maybe even a little to small of an amount for ints, 2 models, and the mqo.
[/quote]
http://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/girls-head-obj-free/403363
That item is 5$ just to give you a comparison.[/quote]

Good comparison

Read full topic
